segments.text: The woman seems lost in her own world, polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how oblivious she is to the chaos unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on the dish is admirable, but it leaves the children unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water flows freely, and I can’t shake my unease.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if someone slips? What if she finally realizes what’s happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch as the boy achieves his goal, cookies in hand, a triumphant grin on his face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In this moment, they’re all just children chasing joy, completely unaware of the consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR
